com.aj.android.commons.java

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.java.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of commonly used String methods for string manipulation for chasing case, removing extra spaces.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain.

        Returns:

      • isBlank

        public static boolean isBlank(java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Checks if a CharSequence is whitespace, empty ("") or null. 
         StringUtils.isBlank(null)      = true
 StringUtils.isBlank("")        = true
 StringUtils.isBlank(" ")       = true
 StringUtils.isBlank("bob")     = false
 StringUtils.isBlank("  bob  ") = false
        Parameters:
        text - -the CharSequence to check, may be null.
        Returns:
        boolean -true if the CharSequence is null, empty or whitespace.

      • trimWhiteSpace

        public static void trimWhiteSpace(java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Trims leading and trailing spaces from the given text.
        Trims the spaces in the same string.
        No change if the input is blank or null.
        Parameters:
        text - -CharSequence object.

        Returns:

      • nthOccurenceOfCharacter

        public static int nthOccurenceOfCharacter(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                                          char character,
                                          int occurence,
                                          boolean lookFromLast)
        Gets the position of given character from the starting of provided string, based on given nth occurrence.
        Parameters:
        text - -String input.
        character - -char which needs to be searched.
        occurence - -int, the occurrence number of character.
        lookFromLast - -boolean, if set to true,will look for given character from back of string.
        Returns:
        int -position of character in given input.

      • nthIndexOfString

        public static int nthIndexOfString(java.lang.String text,
                                   java.lang.String searchString,
                                   int occurrence)
        Gets the position of given search string from the starting of provided string, based on given nth occurrence.
        Parameters:
        text - -the String input.
        searchString - -String to be searched.
        occurrence - -int, the occurrence number of String.
        Returns:
        int -start position of string in given input based on the occurrence.

      • nthIndexOfStringIgnoreCase

        public static int nthIndexOfStringIgnoreCase(java.lang.String text,
                                             java.lang.String searchString,
                                             int occurrence,
                                             java.util.Locale locale)
        Gets the position of given search string from the starting of provided string, based on given nth occurrence ignoring the case..
        Internally calls nthIndexOfString(String, String, int)
        Parameters:
        text - -the String input.
        searchString - -String to be searched.
        occurrence - -int, the occurrence number of String.
        locale - -Locale object.
        Returns:
        int -start position of string in given input based on the occurrence.
